concept.text:
The main idea of this project is to create a fully-modular Node.js framework with bare minimum core decisions so that developers can have full control over how they create REST API servers, fast and minimalistic way.

Zod is an amazing tool for describing everything from data models to API endpoints. So why not putting it in the very heart of a framework?

card-0.title: Dependency Injection
card-0.description: Swap out modules with ease. Controll your state with the power of dependency injection.

card-2.title: Declarative
card-2.description: Everything is a module, composable and extendable. Create and plug them right into the dependency tree.

card-3.title: Type safety
card-3.description: Written in Typescript with Zod request validation, type safety becomes guaranteed.

card-4.title: Guards / middlewares
card-4.description: Add guards to your routes to protect them from unauthorized access or invalid data.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: Zodyac implements a variation of Clean architecture.It is designed to be as abstract and modular as possible, so that your business logic would not rely on implementation.

step-2.title: Run initiation script
step-2.description: The CLI will ask you several questions and generate the initial structure for you.
step-2.notice: You can skip adding lint, git or docker by adding --skip-eslint, --skip-git or --skip-docker flags.
